main.input

Class RESTHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.input.RESTHandler

  • @RestController
public class RESTHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Primary class responsible for communication between the client and the server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RESTHandler(ProjectService projectService)

      Modifies the properties of a shape within a certain layer.

    • Method Detail

      • createProject

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/create",
                method=GET)
public Response createProject()
        Creates a project by subsequently getting a project ID and a default Canvas from the server.
        Returns:
        A server response including an ID and an empty canvas of default dimensions.
        See Also:
        ServerResponse

      • addLayer

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/addLayer/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response addLayer(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                                                      RequestAddLayer request)
        Adds a layer to the canvas specified by the project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body transmitted by the client.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns a canvas which has an additional layer. Otherwise, a basic ErrorResponse is returned.
        See Also:
        RequestAddLayer, ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • addShape

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/addShape/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response addShape(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                      java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                                                                      RequestAddShape request)
        Adds a shape to a specified layer within the canvas, which is specified by the project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body, which specifies the shape which is to be added as well as the corresponding layer.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns a canvas which has an additional shape in the corresponding layer. Otherwise, a basic ErrorResponse is returned.
        See Also:
        RequestAddShape, ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • editCanvas

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/editCanvas/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response editCanvas(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                                                          RequestEditCanvas request)
        Edits the dimensions of a canvas which is accessed via the corresponding project ID.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body, which specifies the desired height and width for the new canvas.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns a canvas which measures request.getWidth() in width and request.getHeight() in height.
        See Also:
        RequestEditCanvas, ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • editLayer

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/editLayer/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response editLayer(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                        RequestEditLayer request)
        Sets the visibility of a certain layer.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body, which specifies the layer which the user wishes to access and the desired visibility.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns the canvas where the visibility of the layer specified by request.getLayerIndex() has been edited.
        See Also:
        RequestEditLayer, ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • editShape

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/editShape/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response editShape(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                        java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                        @RequestBody
                                                                                                                        RequestEditShape request)
        Modifies the properties of a shape within a certain layer.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body, which specifies the layer which the user wishes to access and the modified shape attributes.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns a canvas with an updated version of the shape specified in the request.
        See Also:
        RequestEditShape, ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • transformShape

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/transformShape/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response transformShape(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String request)
        Modifies the visual representation of a shape within a certain layer using the SVG format's inbuilt transform parameters.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body, which specifies the layer which the user wishes to access and SVG transform parameters.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns a canvas with an transformed version of the shape specified in the request.
        See Also:
        ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • deleteLayer

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/deleteLayer/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response deleteLayer(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                                                                            RequestDeleteLayer request)
        Deletes a layer from the canvas whiich is accessed via the project ID..
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body, which specifies the layer which the user wishes to delete.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns an updated canvas which is missing the layer specified in request.getLayerIndex().
        See Also:
        RequestDeleteLayer, ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • deleteShape

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/deleteShape/{projectID}",
                method=POST)
public Response deleteShape(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                            @RequestBody
                                                                                                                            RequestDeleteShape request)
        Deletes a shape within a certain layer of the canvas.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        request - The HTTP POST request body, which specifies the layer which the user wishes to delete.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns a canvas with an updated layer which is missing the shape in request.getShapeIndex().
        See Also:
        RequestDeleteShape, ServerResponse, ErrorResponse

      • download

        @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(produces={"image/svg+xml","image/png","image/jpeg"},
                value="/download/{projectID}/{type}",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> download(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String projectID,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   java.lang.String type)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException
        Downloads the canvas in the desired file format.
        Parameters:
        projectID - The ID the client has been assigned in createProject().
        type - Specifies the file format.
        Returns:
        If successfully called, it returns a .svg/.png/.jpg file, which shows a representation of the most recent canvas.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
        org.apache.batik.transcoder.TranscoderException - If transcoding to the desired image format fails.
        See Also:
        ResponseEntity
